game.name: Good Things Vol 1
game.genres: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, Racing, RPG, Simulation, Sports, Strategy
game.shortDescription: Good Things Vol 1 is a collection of 15 wildly imaginative, weird little games ranging from evolving platformers to genre-bending adventure... but the Blue Elephant ate all the games, and if you do not help him he will DIE :(
game.shortDescriptionEn: Good Things Vol 1 is a collection of 15 wildly imaginative, weird little games ranging from evolving platformers to genre-bending adventure... but the Blue Elephant ate all the games, and if you do not help him he will DIE :(
